name: alexa-skill-nodejs810-construct
description: * `npm run build`   compile typescript to js  * `npm run watch`   watch for changes and compile  * `cdk deploy -c skillId=<SkillId> -c skillName=<SkillName>`      deploy this stack to your default AWS account/region  * `cdk diff`        compare deployed stack with current state  * `cdk synth -c skillId=<SkillId> -c skillName=<SkillName>`       emits the synthesized CloudFormation template
author: Sanket Nayak
